People come to LTK to shop millions of products tried and styled by real people. LTK connects people/shoppers with Creators who match their personal style and get inspired everyday. Hundreds of thousands of Creators across social media and blogs use LTK to turn their hobbies and passions into entrepreneurship and help support their dreams and families financially. Our mission at LTK is to make world’s lifestyle creators achieve maximum economic success. In your role, you will be challenged to take on work that upholds this mission and pushes LTK forward. You will grow as a person and a leader in your field, all the while helping Creators and their followers connect and instantly shop in the most inspiring way.We are looking for a senior leader with an entrepreneurial streak to help LTK grow the flywheel where audiences engage with creators in the most inspiring ways and instantly shop the styles. This requires creating innovative user experiences that are deeply personalized and balance showing content that is inspiring and maximizes monetary outcomes for our creators. In this role you will reimagine the feed experience from scratch, build an exceptionally inspiring product vision, evangelize across the company, a product strategy that maximizes building and learning fastand partner closely with cross functional teams including engineering, design, researchers, content/ creator teams, data analysts, AI/ML engineers and data scientists. You will start as an entrepreneur, move fast, and over time will be responsible for building a high functioning product team at scale.What You’ll DoLead defining the vision & strategy for feeds and browse experience across the LTK app to deliver the most inspiring and personalized creator content to our user’s feedsLead analyses of the competitive environment and product metrics to determine the right set of features to drive user value on LTK.In this role you will partner closely with cross functional teams including engineering, design, researchers, content/ creator teams, data analysts, AI/ML engineers and data scientistsDrive product requirements definition, product planning and product design (including writing PRDs) of new features and enhancementsClearly communicate product benefits to our users and internal stakeholdersEvangelize Feed to internal stakeholders, creators and executivesWhat We’re Looking For10+ years of experience in a product management or equivalent roleConsumer internet product experienceExperience with AI applied to solve concrete user problems and/or to help users discover relevant information, while also keeping up to date with latest AI/ML technologies0 -> 1 product experienceExperience with Mobile InterfacesManagerial experience with a product management teamPreferred QualificationsPrior news feed experience (this could include working on products involving personalization and discovery)Prior marketplace and content experience is a big bonusProven experience building delightful mobile products from the ground upExcellent communication skills with the ability to interact with and understand technical subjects and emerging technologies and their relevance to LTKAbility to manage and lead across highly cross-functional teamsDemonstrated ability to communicate findings clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences at executive levelIdeal candidate understands building meaningful habit-forming products, social platforms, who is creative, design-oriented.BS/BA degree in a technology related field OR equivalent experienceSkillsProduct ManagementArtificial IntelligenceMobile InterfacesContent ExperiencePeople-first leadershipWhat's in it for you as a team member at LTK? At LTK, we believe in taking care of our team members and offer competitive compensation and benefits including medical, dental, and vision, paid maternity and paternity leave and a 401k retirement plan with a LTK matching contribution. To make sure our employees stay healthy and balanced, we also offer wellness benefits such as a flexible work schedule plus Summer Fridays (Workday ends at 3pm). We don’t forget to have fun either with virtual company happy hours and virtual team events! And last but not least, you get to work on interesting problems that will help disrupt the retail industry!What you have to look forward to when you work or visit for team huddles at a LTK Office: Fully stocked bars and kitchen (free snacks all day!) Catered meals weekly Monthly Chair massagesLaidback office environment Monthly themed Happy Hours! Free access to state of the art gym while working in or visiting our Dallas HQFree Covered Parking on-site while working in or visiting our Dallas HQAbout UsAs the founder of creator guided shopping, LTK is the trusted and effective platform for creators and their businesses by powering the connection between content and commerce. Founded in 2011 by Amber and Baxter Box, the LTK mission is to empower creators to be as economically successful as possible. World premium lifestyle creators in 150+ countries drive more than $3.6 billion in annual retail sales through their LTK Creator Shop profiles. Today, more than 18 million consumers turn to LTK Creator Shops in the LTK shopping platform each month to find inspiration and instantly shop the styles recommended by their favorite creators. And, more than 6,000 brands partner with LTK to gain access to its global creator network for content that converts against performance-driven, cross-channel KPIs. A three-time honoree on Fast Company’s list of Most Innovative Retail Companies, LTK is headquartered in Dallas, TX and currently operates on five continents. To download the LTK shopping app, search for LTK in the App Store or Google Play.For the latest LTK Creator updates, follow LTK.HQ, and for the latest shopping trends and updates from LTK, follow Shop.LTK.For US-Based Roles: We are not offering new sponsorships opportunities at this time for persons requiring employment visas, such as an H-1B; authorization to work in the U.S. is a precondition of employment.Any unsolicited resumes/candidate profiles submitted through our website or to personal email accounts of employees of LTK are considered the property of LTK and are not subject to payment of agency fees.LTK is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
